name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AdShield - Ultimate Ad Blocker for YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block YouTube ads, YouTube video ads, JioCinema ... AdShield ensures a distraction-free, faster, and private browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AdShield - Your Ultimate Solution to Ad-Free Browsing

Features:
YouTube Ad Blocking: Removes pre-roll, mid-roll, and banner ads, ensuring uninterrupted video playback.
Video Ad Skipping: Automatically skips video ads on platforms like YouTube, Hotstar and JioCinema.
Dynamic Ad Removal: Blocks overlay ads, banners, and pop-ups dynamically across supported platforms.
Fast and Lightweight: Efficient ad-blocking that improves page load times and reduces bandwidth usage.
Privacy Protection: Prevents trackers from collecting your data for targeted ads.

AdShield now includes a powerful enhancement that automatically skips the YouTube modal requesting ad blocker exceptions

Why Choose AdShield?
AdShield not only blocks ads but also enhances your browsing experience with faster page loads, improved video streaming, and complete privacy. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to the web as it should be.

Supported Platforms:
YouTube
Hotstar
JioCinema

Install AdShield today and enjoy a truly ad-free browsing experience!

Ad blocker
YouTube ad blocker
Hotstar ad blocker
JioCinema ad blocker
Video ad blocker
Free ad blocker
Chrome extension for ad blocking
Remove ads from videos
Faster browsing
Privacy protection

This extension tracks page views and hostnames using Google Analytics to enhance the user experience. It collects minimal data (a unique client ID and active tab hostname) for statistical analysis, securely transmitted to Google Analytics. No personal or sensitive data is collected or shared.
